definition: to rule/to govern/to manage/to control/to harness (a river)/to treat (a disease)/to wipe out (a pest)/to punish/to research
system/to control/to regulate/variant of 製|制[zhi4]

sentences.english: Power-centralized political system is political origin of the debt.
sentences.chinese: 權力集中型政治體制是導致鄉鎮負債的政治根源。

sentences.english: For Merkel and the German political establishment, it's the best of both worlds.
sentences.chinese: 對於默克爾和德國的政治體制，這是兩全其美的。

sentences.english: The American political system makes it hard to displace entrenched interest groups.
sentences.chinese: 美國的政治體制使得根深蒂固的利益集團難以被取代。

sentences.english: The US political system poses special problems as well.
sentences.chinese: 美國的政治體制也帶來了特殊的問題。

sentences.english: Reforms in the economic and political structure are very closely intertwined and mutually reinforced.
sentences.chinese: 其中經濟體制和政治體制的改革交織甚密，互爲促進。

sentences.english: The American political system is a classical example of the two-party system.
sentences.chinese: 美國的政治體制是兩黨制的典型範例。

sentences.english: In today’s political system, can either party ever raise taxes on anybody?
sentences.chinese: 如今的政治體制，任何一個政黨可以提高別人的稅率？

sentences.english: We persevered in the numb economical and political system.
sentences.chinese: 我們固守僵化的經濟和政治體制。

sentences.english: It is our political system that is not working.
sentences.chinese: 此刻運轉不靈的是我們的政治體制。

sentences.english: That, after all, is how our political system was designed to work.
sentences.chinese: 畢竟，我們的政治體制的運作就是這樣設計的。

sentences.english: The right to dissent is part of our political system.
sentences.chinese: 有持異議的權利是我們政治體制的組成部分。

sentences.english: Federalism is one major characteristic of Indian political system.
Many features of the American political system promote the decentralization of power.
sentences.chinese: 美國政治體制中有促進權力分散的多項特徵。

sentences.english: Excessive campaign spending is corrupting the American political system.
sentences.chinese: 過多的競選花銷正在使美國的政治體制墮落。

sentences.english: You also had these political structures that are in your handout.
sentences.chinese: 講義上還寫了以下這些希臘政治體制。

definition: highest common factor HCF/greatest common divisor GCD
to take turns/to work by roster

pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 te4 se4 she4 hui4 zhu3 yi4
